tool_description: Use Palette's new AI engine (which powers 2.8 Millon users) to colorize your photos.
name: Colorize Photo
title: Colorize Photo

api_list.name: root
api_list.description: Health check by calling the root URL = /
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://colorize-photo1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "colorize-photo1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
